code: export var checkSpecial=function checkSpecial(str){var regExp=/[!?@#$%^&*():;+-=~{}<>\_\[\]\|\\\"\'\,\.\/\`\₩]/g;if(regExp.test(str))return true;return false;};export var checkNum=function checkNum(str){var regExp=/[0-9]/g;if(regExp.test(str))return true;return false;};export var checkEmoji=function checkEmoji(str){var regExp=/([\u2700-\u27BF]|[\uE000-\uF8FF]|\uD83C[\uDC00-\uDFFF]|\uD83D[\uDC00-\uDFFF]|[\u2011-\u26FF]|\uD83E[\uDD10-\uDDFF])/g;if(regExp.test(str))return true;return false;};export var checkSpace=function checkSpace(str){if(str.search(/\s/)!==-1)return true;return false;};export var checkLength=function checkLength(str){var start=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:1;var end=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:10000;if(str.length>=start&&str.length<=end)return true;return false;};export var validateDateOfBirth=function validateDateOfBirth(dateOfBirth){if(checkLength(dateOfBirth))return true;return false;};export var validateNickName=function validateNickName(nickName){if(checkSpecial(nickName)||checkSpace(nickName)||checkNum(nickName)||checkEmoji(nickName))return{state:false,type:'notLengthErr'};if(!checkLength(nickName,2,8))return{state:false,type:'lengthErr'};return{state:true};};export var validateHeight=function validateHeight(height){if(checkLength(height)&&height>=90&&height<=250)return true;return false;};export var validateWeight=function validateWeight(weight){if(checkLength(weight)&&weight>=30&&weight<=200)return true;return false;};export var validateFootSize=function validateFootSize(footSize){if(checkLength(footSize)&&footSize>=0&&footSize<=350)return true;return false;};export var validateAllInput=function validateAllInput(info){return validateDateOfBirth(info.dateOfBirth)&&validateNickName(info.nickname)&&validateHeight(info.height)&&validateWeight(info.weight)&&validateFootSize(info.footSize)?true:false;};
